mean_cn: n. 负载; 负荷; 工作量; 装载量; vi. 加载; 装载; 装货;vt. 使担负; 装载;

sentence_tra: 在飞机起飞前，他们需要装载货物。

sentence: She will definitely achieve her goal--I know it.
sentence_tra: 我知道她肯定能实现她的目标。

mean_cn: n.衬垫；护具；便笺簿； （动物的）脚；浮叶v.填塞
sentence: You can use an iPad to write notes instead of a pad of paper.
sentence_tra: 你可以不用纸质的便签簿，而用iPad来记笔记。

sentence: For a start, you should clean up your desk!
sentence_tra: 首先，你应该清理你的桌子！

sentence: The astronauts boarded the spaceship at the spaceport.
sentence_tra: 宇航员从太空基地登上了太空飞船。

sentence: I really admire her optimistic attitude.
sentence_tra: 我真的佩服她乐观的态度。

sentence: Oh no! I think we are stuck in the mud!
sentence_tra: 哦不!我想我们困在泥里了！

mean_cn: n.(常用复数)资源，财力，办法
sentence: The world's oil supply is a limited resource.
sentence_tra: 世界石油资源是有限的。

sentence: A colony on another planet might look like this!
sentence_tra: 在另一个星球的殖民地可能是这样的！
